typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Category as string,
		Regions as (Region as string, {Sub-Categories} as (EmployeeSales as (Comment as string, Employee as string, Sales as integer)[], {Sub-Category} as string)[])[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'arrayOfDocuments',
	hasComments: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> source1
source1 foldDown(unroll(Regions.{Sub-Categories}.EmployeeSales, Regions),
	mapColumn(
		Categoty = Category,
		Region = Regions.Region,
		{Sub-Category} = Regions.{Sub-Categories}.{Sub-Category},
		Employee = Regions.{Sub-Categories}.EmployeeSales.Employee,
		Sales = Regions.{Sub-Categories}.EmployeeSales.Sales,
		Comment = Regions.{Sub-Categories}.EmployeeSales.Comment
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten1
Flatten1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		Categoty,
		Region,
		{Sub-Category},
		Employee,
		Sales,
		Comment
	)) ~> sink1
